column4: is the installer on lucid significantly different from the one on karmic?
it doesn't start in a text-ish mode for me, tries to go straight to X
doesn't seem to like my video though
if you really really want to keep your settings and dont want to spend time reinstalling stuff then I would just upgrade, I prefer a clean install once I confirm the latest release works
me too, but like i said, the installer cd for lynx ends up in a black screen
